ygData.subject: Re: Rivervale to Qeynos?
ygData.msgSnippet: Jaez, I know.  I have chars on other servers that are old enough to hunt in BB but with everyone else in there and all the magic casting ... I end up lagging
ygData.messageBody:
Jaez,

I know. I have chars on other servers that are "old enough" to hunt in BB but
with everyone else in there and all the magic casting ... I end up lagging
sooooooooooooo much. My screen will even freeze at times and I have no clue
what is happening (like if I'm dead). I finally gave up hunting there and
moved on to the Karanas. I'm not making any cash at all, but at least I can
actually play the game.

I've got a new 'puter being built, should get it in the next week. And we're
waiting for the cable company to call & set a date for cable modem
installation. So I expect the lag problem should improve dramatically for me.
Meanwhile, I hunt the less crowded areas.

Safe travels,
Wynsong
Woodelf Bard, Level 4
Rivervale, Quellious

Douglass Family wrote:

> From: "Douglass Family" <frd@...>
>
> I know you dont want to hear this but as you grow up the lag problem is
> going to get worse, if you are that bad in those areas, wait untill you try
> BlackBurrow, or god forbid Befallen, Unrest, or Guk.
>
> Jaez
> -----Original Message-----
> From: weya <weya@...>
> To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
> Date: Wednesday, July 07, 1999 9:27 PM
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Rivervale to Qeynos?
>
> >From: weya <weya@...>
> >
> >Lulen,
> >
> >You know what? I am very green to be so far from home, lol. It's a
> >blessing in some ways ... less to risk making the journey from Kelethin
> >to Rivervale ... if I died all I lost was my guild tunic -- and I gained
> >food back, lol.
> >
> >Basically, the reason why I left Kelethin so early is because Quellious
> >is a very young server so all the pc's were hunting in Faydark. I have
> >a crap computer (P200, 32mb RAM, 8mb StealthII) and with all the other
> >young pc's running around hunting my lag was waaaaaaaayyyyyyyy up. I
> >spent the whole time running around after npc's that were no longer
> >there or that someone else had already started whacking at. I'd start
> >combat with something right in front of me and *pop* it'd be 30 feet
> >away dying by someone else's hand -- you get the picture. I was getting
> >ready to delete the character and make something in Qeynos (I never have
> >that problem there for some reason) when a friend was making the journey
> >to Freeport. So I decided to go along for the run just for a change
> >from the frustration of swatting at "ghosts".
> >
> >Once I was bound to Freeport, the server itself was having problems with
> >lag in the hunting grounds outside the west gate. 1000+ server side
> >lag. Even one morning with only 400 ppl on Quellious in total, and only
> >maybe 20 ppl in West Freeport, I was still running at 600+ on the server
> >side (that's the number on the right side, correct?). So, it was make
> >the run to Rivervale or scrap the char. So, here I am in Rivervale.
> >
> >Wynsong
> >Woodelf Bard, Level 3
> >Faaaarrrrr from home in Rivervale, Quellious
> >
> >
> >
> >Message: 20
> > Date: Wed, 7 Jul 1999 18:09:37 -0500
> > From: "Codo the Mysterious" <codo@...>
> >Subject: Re: Rivervale to Qeynos?
> >
> >I know this may seem like a silly question, but don't you think you're a
> >
> >little green to be so far from home just yet? It's fairly easy to hike
> >yourself up to level 5 in the Feydarks. Travel from Rivervale to Qeynos
> >is
> >VERY dangerous.....
> >
> >Lulen
> >Bard of the 13th Chorus
> >Solusek Ro
> >
> >--
> >~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> >Expand in consciousness-
> >be ready to accept anything now,
> >at any time. --Eileen Caddy
> >~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> >weya@...
> >ICQ# 1976509
> >AOL IM: weya
